data.title: Great food and service
data.text: The breakfast plates ot tacos are great and not expensive. At lunch, they have different specials. The chicken fajita plate is great.

data.title: Good food Good Service
data.text:
Nice quite restaurant 
Definitely a place to relax and enjoy a good meal.
Our server was great, beer came full dressed and the strawberry margarita had wonderful frozen fruits, a treat and nice surprise.
Upon ordering the waiter was good with my husband dinner platter, but when it came to my order he suggested another option. What a great suggestion - my shrimp came in a beautiful hot molcajete bowl. Wonderful choice I'm so pleased my waiter brought that to my attention.
My husbands platter was equally impressive. 
El Vaquero serves breakfast, lunch and dinner specials. 
Stop in and try them reasonably priced with great specials.

data.title: Never seen it packed but the food is good
data.text: I like this place because even though  they got good food I usually haven't had problems to find a spot , I really don't know wh maybe is the time I go , but the food is good and the service I've been here several times

data.title: The food sucker n service.
data.text: The food was discussing n the service was crappy. The Milanesa was gross no meat just breaded. I will never go back. I will never no back

data.title: Good service and you don't have to wait to be seated
data.text: We decided to try this restaurant a while back, not really sure whether we would like it or not. To our surprise it was not bad. There was not wait for a table, the service was quick and the plates are made to order. We have tried their breakfast, family has tried lunch and all has been good.

data.title: Great breakfast.
data.text: The breakfast plates ot tacos are great and not expensive. At noon, they have different specials. The fajita plate and the vermicelli is great.

data.title: Good breakfast
data.text: I had the chicharron plate,  it was very good,  of it wasn't for the coffee or had been perfect,  I think they should change their coffee brand,  very clean place. I recommend it.

data.title: Pricey and bad service
data.text: Went with my brother in law..We like to try new restaurants,anyways looked at the menu and the prices were off the roof,We still wanted to give it a chance; so we were there for like 45 min still no food... and there weren't alot of people.. we just decided to pay for the drinks and left.. really bad restaurant

data.title: nice people, awesome food
data.text: Had a meal with family one evening while traveling through town. Hope the locals will do a good job of supporting this restaurant.  The food was really good and the staff were very attentive.  One dish, the filet florentine was super unique and tasty.  I had stuffed shrimp that were excellent.  Thank you!

data.title: What is a reasonable wait time?
data.text: Unfortunately, I cannot evaluate the food quality versus price sine we chose to leave after waiting 58 minutes. My wife, 99 year old father-in-law, and I entered the restaurant and sat at the only available table which happened to be next to the front door at 12:32 p.m. Sunday afternoon. On one hand we were encouraged at how busy the restaurant were therefore expecting great food. But, on the other hand, we were disappointed to experience a very noisy atmosphere. We were coping with the noise while waiting 5 to 10 minutes before any wait staff came to our table. Finally we were greeted by the manager and or owner who presented us with menus while welcoming and thanking us for choosing this restaurant. He said, "your waiter will be here soon, although I don't know who it is". Hmm... Someone brought complementary chips and salsa and we then waited close to 15 minutes for the unknown server. We ordered water to drink and placed our meal order. The water arrived after another 5-10 minutes. THEN the REAL wait began. As time went by, our server NEVER returned to our table to check on us, offer water refills, or explain the delay in getting our food. 58 minutes had passed since we sat down and another 40 minutes since placing our order plus no further visits from our server. In frustration we rose and slowly walked out. This was our first and most likely our last visit. To the staff and management I would say, "You get only one chance to make a good first impression!"

data.title: "Really good food at a good price"
data.text:
Four of us attended at this restaurant on a Saturday afternoon about 1:00 pm. The place was really busy but the wait staff were quick to place our order. My wife tried the ground beef chile relleno, the other couple had the mexican plate ( consisting of 2 cheese enchilada, beans, rice, one chalupa and one crispy taco) and I had the El Vaquero plate (same as the mexican plate  except I got a sliced beef fajita (2). Cost of the plates was $5.99

The staff kept the room clean considering how busy they were and the washrooms were clean. I would definitley go back. The only downfall is that they do not have a liquor licence.
